p: In total, A(H1N1)pdm09 cases comprised 65% of all studied and diagnostically confirmed influenza lethal cases in Russia, with H3N2 and influenza type B being 15% and 20%, respectively, according to data provided to SRC VB “Vector” by the local laboratories of Rospotrebnadzor Sanitary-and-Epidemiological Centers ( Table 1). 29 cases of A(H1N1)pdm09 selected for this genetic study included 19 cases with lethal outcomes.
